availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jean Yates Russell (Lawrence County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Scotland. Married to Thomas Russell. Mother of Hugh Russell, Anna "Ann" Russell, Andrew Russell, Robert Russell, Elizabeth Russell, Catherine Russell, and Alice Russell. Resident of Lawrence County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, pp. 604-605.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Ashland, p. 84B.
"Jean Yates Russell (1827-1887)," Find A Grave, Memorial #74205465, accessed July 13, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/74205465/jean-russell.
